content.prompt: The Tenth Amendment to the Constitution has been interpreted by the Supreme Court to

choices.label: prevent states from taxing agencies of the federal government
allow for the burning of the flag as an expression of protest
limit the use of the legislative veto

topic.text: 1.7: Relationship Between the States and National Government

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
